title: The Deep End Volume 3: "Unbound"
description: Part 3 of the erotic novella series "The Deep End", Unbound picks up right where Bound Together left off. Will Jake's obsession come between Nicole and Dakota? Will Dara take a hint and go away? Will Nicole be able to walk without crutches after another night with Dakota? That's for you to find out.If you don't like reading controversial subject matter, descriptive sex scenes, and dramatic situations, you may want to stay in safer, more shallow waters...However, if you enjoy reading about hot alpha males in steamy sex scenes, taboo topics, and edge-of-your-seat drama... you may just have what it takes to ventere into The Deep End.
author: Lourie Nolan
